GV03sb_06_u:534: sarvasya pratiṣṭhā tadyatraite paśavo gatāstata enānadhi sambharāma iti na tathā
GV03sb_06_u:535: kuryādyo vā eteṣāmāvṛtaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca na vidyāttasyaita utsannāḥ syuḥ sa
GV03sb_06_u:536: etāneva pañca paśūnālabheta yāvadasya vaśaḥ syāttānhaitānprajāpatiḥ prathama ālebhe
GV03sb_06_u:545: dvayāni vai śyāmasya lomāni śuklāni ca kṛṣṇāni ca dvandvam
GV03sb_06_u:546: mithunam prajananaṃ tadasya prājāpatyaṃ rūpaṃ tūfaro bhavati tūparo hi prajāpatiḥ 6.2.2.[3]
GV03sb_06_u:549: dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastraya ime lokā asāvāditya
GV03sb_06_u:554: ekaviṃśo vai puruṣo daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā
GV03sb_06_u:562: paśupuroḍāśo ya eva paśorbandhuḥ sa puroḍāśasya dvādaśakapālo dvādaśa māsāḥ
GV03sb_06_u:563: saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ kadvatyo yājyānuvākyāḥ ko hi prajāpatiḥ 6.2.2.[6]
GV03sb_06_u:568: lapsudyabhavadraso vai reto yāvānu vai rasastāvānātmā tadyadetamālabhate
GV03sb_06_u:569: tadevāgnerantam paryeti śuklo bhavati śuklaṃ hi retastūparo bhavati tūparaṃ hi reto
GV03sb_06_u:570: vāyave bhavati prāṇo vai vāyurniyutvate bhavatyudāno vai niyutaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:576: paśunādadhustathaivāsminnayametaddadhāti vāyave bhavati prāṇo vai vāyurniyutvate
GV03sb_06_u:577: bhavatyudāno vai niyutaḥ prāṇodānāvevāsminnetaddadhāti śuklo bhavati śuklo hi
GV03sb_06_u:581: saptadaśo vai saṃvatsaro dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:586: saptadaśo vai puruṣo daśa prāṇāścatvāryaṅgānyātmā pañcadaśo
GV03sb_06_u:587: grīvāḥ ṣoḍaśyaḥ śiraḥ saptadaśam puruṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_06_u:593: kāma upāpta iti ha smāha māhitthiryaṃ carakāḥ prājāpatye paśāvāhuriti 6.2.2.[11]
GV03sb_06_u:598: prājāpatyāvardhaṃ haivāsya kṛtaṃ syānnārdhamatha yadvāyavyaḥ paśurbhavati
GV03sb_06_u:599: prājāpatyaḥ paśupuroḍāśastena haivaitaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saskaroti 6.2.2.[12]
GV03sb_06_u:603: yatra devāḥ samaskurvantsa yo 'smātprāṇo madhyata udakrāmattamasminnetena
GV03sb_06_u:605: prajāpatirhyātmā dvādaśakapālo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_06_u:610: yadetena madhyataścaranti madhyato hyayamātmātha yaddhaviṣopariṣṭāccaranti ya
GV03sb_06_u:615: vapāyā eva śuklavatyau syātāmetāvadvai paśau śuklaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:616: yadvapāśuklavatyau niyutvatyau haviṣo yadeva niyutvadrūpaṃ tasyopāptyā iti 6.2.2.[15]
GV03sb_06_u:619: etasminha paśau sarveṣām paśūnāṃ rūpaṃ yattūparo
GV03sb_06_u:620: lapsudī tatpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tūparo hi lapsudī puruṣo yattūparaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:621: kesaravāṃstadaśvasya rūpaṃ tūparo hi kesaravānaśvo yadaṣṭāśaphastadgo
GV03sb_06_u:622: rūpamaṣṭāśapho hi gauratha yadasyāveriva śaphāstadave rūpaṃ yadajastadajasya
GV03sb_06_u:623: tadyadetamālabhate tena haivāsyaite sarve paśava ālabdhā bhavantyato yatamadasya
GV03sb_06_u:624: karmopakalpetaite vā pañca paśava eṣa vā prājāpatya eṣa vā niyutvatīyaḥ 6.2.2.[16]
GV03sb_06_u:628: prajāpatiṃ sa etāṃ rātrimiha vasati tadyathopatiṣṭhantamālabhetaivaṃ taditi 6.2.2.[17]
GV03sb_06_u:631: asau vai candraḥ paśustaṃ devāḥ paurṇamāsyāmālabhante
GV03sb_06_u:632: yatrainaṃ devā ālabhante tadenamālabhā iti tasmātpaurṇamāsyāṃ yadveva
GV03sb_06_u:633: paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsī ha vāva prathamā vyuvāsa tasmādveva paurṇamāsyām 6.2.2.[18]
GV03sb_06_u:636: eṣā ha saṃvatsarasya prathamā rātriryatphālgunī paurṇamāsī
GV03sb_06_u:637: yottaraiṣottamā yā pūrvā mukhata eva tatsaṃvatsaramārabhate 6.2.2.[19]
GV03sb_06_u:640: atha paśumālabheta paurṇamāsena vā indro vṛtram
GV03sb_06_u:649: prājāpatyaṃ vā etatkarma prajāpatiṃ hyetena karmaṇārabhate 'nirukto
GV03sb_06_u:653: reto vā atra yajña upāṃśu vai retaḥ sicyate vapā paśupuroḍāśo
GV03sb_06_u:658: yadukhā prājāpatya eva tadahanprājāpatyaṃ karma karoti 6.2.2.[24]
GV03sb_06_u:665: aṣṭakā vā ukhā nidhirdvā uddhī tiraścī rāsnā taccatuścitasra
GV03sb_06_u:669: amāvāsyāyai vā adhi yajñastāyate yato yajñastāyate tato yajñaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:673: reto vā etadbhūtamātmānaṃ siñcatyukhāyāṃ yonau yaddīkṣate
GV03sb_06_u:674: tasmā etam purastāllokaṃ karoti yaddīkṣito bhavati taṃ kṛtaṃ lokamabhi jāyate
GV03sb_06_u:675: tasmādāhuḥ kṛta lokam puruṣo 'bhi jāyata iti 6.2.2.[28]
GV03sb_06_u:680: atiricyerannatha yadamāvāsyāyāṃ dīkṣitvāmāvāsyāyāṃ krīṇāti tadyāvantameva lokaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:684: yānyūrdhvāni krayādahāni kathamasya te lokā anūpahitā bhavantīti yadvā
GV03sb_06_u:685: amāvāsyāyāṃ dīkṣitvāmāvāsyāyāṃ krīṇāti tadyāvantameva lokaṃ karoti tāvatīriṣṭakā
GV03sb_06_u:686: upadadhātyatha yānyūrdhvāni krayādahāni tasminnavakāśe 'dhvaryuragniṃ cinoti kvo
GV03sb_06_u:687: hi cinuyānna ca so 'vakāśaḥ syādyāvanti vai saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇi tāvatya
GV03sb_06_u:688: etasyāgneriṣṭakā upa ca trayodaśo māsastrayodaśo vā eṣa māso yānyūrdhvāni
GV03sb_06_u:689: krayādahāni tadyā amūstrayodaśasya māsa iṣṭakāstābhirasya te lokā anūpahitā
GV03sb_06_u:694: tasyāmukhāṃ sambharati yā prathamāmāvāsyā tasyāṃ dīkṣata etadvai yānyeva
GV03sb_06_u:695: saṃvatsarasya prathamānyahāni tānyasya tadārabhate tāni ca tadāpnotyathātaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:699: sampadyata ityeteṣāṃ vai pañcānām paśūnāṃ caturviṃśatiḥ sāmidhenyo
GV03sb_06_u:704: sarvaṃ jagadiyamu vā agnirasyai hi sarvo 'gniścīyate yāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_06_u:708: aṣṭācatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai jagatī jagatī sarvāṇi candāṃsi
GV03sb_06_u:709: sarvāṇi candāṃsi prajāpatiḥ prajāpatiragniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvattadbhavati 6.2.2.[34]
GV03sb_06_u:712: sā daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍagnirdaśa diśo diśo 'gnirdaśa prāṇāḥ prāṇā
GV03sb_06_u:717: ṛtumāpnotyṛtuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ tatsaṃvatsaramagnimāpnoti ye ca saṃvatsare kāmā atha
GV03sb_06_u:724: dvāvāghārau tatṣaṣṭiḥ sa yaḥ ṣaṣṭyāṃ kāmo 'traiva tamāpnotyatha yadato
GV03sb_06_u:731: 'ṣṭāpañcāśati kāmo 'traiva tamāpnoti vanaspatiśca vasāhomaśca tatṣaṣṭiḥ sa yaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:738: samiṣṭayajūṃṣi saṃsthāvabhṛtho nedārambhe devatā vyavasṛjāni nedyajñaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:739: saṃsthāpayānīti sa vai sameva sthāpayedetena paśuneṣṭvā
GV03sb_06_u:741: saṃsthāpayati prāṇa eṣa paśustasya yadantariyātprāṇasya tadantariyādyadu vai
GV03sb_06_u:742: prāṇasyāntariyāttata evam mriyeta tasmātsameva sthāpayedathāto vratānāmeva 6.2.2.[39]
GV03sb_06_u:744: tadāhuḥ / naitena paśuneṣṭvopari śayīta na māṃsamaśnīyānna
GV03sb_06_u:745: mithunamupeyātpūrvadīkṣā vā eṣa paśuranavakLptaṃ vai tadyaddīkṣita upari
GV03sb_06_u:746: śayīta yanmāṃsamaśnīyādyanmithunamepeyāditi netvevaiṣā dīkṣā neva hi
GV03sb_06_u:747: mekhalāsti na kṛṣṇājinamiṣṭakāṃ vā etāṃ kurute tasmādu kāmamevopari śayītaitadu
GV03sb_06_u:748: sarvamannaṃ yadate paśavastadasyātrāptamārabdham bhavati tadyāni kāni
GV03sb_06_u:749: cāmadhuno 'śanāni teṣāmasya sarveṣāṃ kāmāśanaṃ yadi labheta mithunaṃ tu
GV03sb_06_u:753: ādiṣṭadakṣiṇāṃ dadyādbrahmā vai sarvo yajñastadasya sarvo yajño bhiṣajjayito
GV03sb_06_u:754: bhavatīti na tathā kuryādiṣṭakāṃ vā etāṃ kurute tadyatheṣṭakāyāmiṣṭakāyāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:763: upāhamāyānīti keneti paśubhiriti tatheti paśviṣṭakayā ha
GV03sb_06_u:764: taduvācaiṣā vāva paśviṣṭakā yaddūrveṣṭakā tasmātprathamāyai svayamātṛṇāyā
GV03sb_06_u:768: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvameveti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti teṣāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:769: cetayamānānāmindrāgnī ca viśvakarmā cāntarikṣaṃ dvitīyāṃ svayamātṛṇāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:773: upāhamāyānīti keneti digbhiriti tatheti diśyābhirha taduvāca
GV03sb_06_u:777: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvameveti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti teṣāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:778: cetayamānānām parameṣṭhī divaṃ tṛtīyaṃ svayamātṛṇāṃ citimapaśyattasmāttām
GV03sb_06_u:783: lokampṛṇātmanā haiva taduvāca tasmāttṛtīyā svayamātṛṇānantarhitā lokampṛṇāyā
GV03sb_06_u:787: idaṃ sarvamabhavanyadidaṃ kiṃ ca te devāśca
GV03sb_06_u:788: 'rṣayaścābruvannimā vāva ṣaḍ devatā idaṃ sarvamabhūvannupa tajjānīta yathā
GV03sb_06_u:790: yathā vayamihāpyasāmeti teṣāṃ cetayamānānāṃ devā dvitīyāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:793: te 'bruvan / upa vayamāyāmeti keneti yadeṣu lokeṣūpeti tatheti tadyadūrdhvam
GV03sb_06_u:794: pṛthivyā arvācīnamantarikṣāttena devā upāyaṃstadeṣā dvitīyā citiratha
GV03sb_06_u:803: citimapaśyandevā eva tasyā ārṣeyamindrāgnī ca viśvakarmā ca tṛtīyāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:804: citimapaśyaṃsta eva tasyā ārṣeyamṛṣayaścaturthīṃ citimapaśyannṛṣaya eva tasyā
GV03sb_06_u:805: ārṣeyam parameṣṭhī pañcamīṃ citimapaśyatparameṣṭhyeva tasyā ārṣeyaṃ sa yo
GV03sb_06_u:806: haitadevaṃ citīnāmārṣeyaṃ vedārṣeyavatyo hāsya bandhumatyaścitayo bhavanti 6.3.1.[1]
GV03sb_06_u:814: te yadabruvan cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvanyaccetayamānā
GV03sb_06_u:817: tāṃ vā etām / ekaṃ satīmaṣṭāgṛhītāmaṣṭābhiryajurbhirjuhoti tasmādiyamekā
GV03sb_06_u:825: etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na iha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_06_u:831: prītvāthainaṃ sambharati tadyadetayā savitāram prīṇāti tasmāsāvitrāṇi tasmādvā
GV03sb_06_u:836: yādṛguai yonau retaḥ sicyate tādṛgjāyate tadyadetayā savitāraṃ reto bhūtaṃ siñcati
GV03sb_06_u:840: vāgvai srukprāṇaḥ sruvo vācā ca vai prāṇena caitadagre
GV03sb_06_u:844: yo vai sa prajāpatirāsīdeṣa sa sruvaḥ prāṇo vai sruvaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:845: prāṇaḥ prajāpatiratha yā sā vāgāsīdeṣā sā srugyoṣā vai vāgyoṣā srugatha yāstā āpa
GV03sb_06_u:849: saṃtatā hi tā āpa āyannatha yaḥ sa prajāpatistrayyā vidyayā
GV03sb_06_u:853: ime te lokā atha yaccuturthaṃ yajustrayī sā vidyā jagatī sā
GV03sb_06_u:854: bhavati jagatī sarvāṇi candāṃsi sarvāṇi candāṃsi trayī vidyātha yāni catvāryuttamāni
GV03sb_06_u:855: diśastānīme ca vai lokā diśaśca prajāpatirathaiṣā trayī vidyā 6.3.1.[12]
GV03sb_06_u:857: sa juhoti / yañjānaḥ prathamam mana iti prajāpatirvai yuñjānaḥ sa mana etasmai
GV03sb_06_u:858: karmaṇe yuṅkta tadyanmana etasmai karmaṇe 'yuṅkta tasmātprajāpatiryuñjānaḥ 6.3.1.[13]
GV03sb_06_u:866: mana evaitadetasmai karmaṇe yuṅkte na hyuyuktena
GV03sb_06_u:867: manasā kiṃ cana samprati śaknāti kartuṃ devasya savituḥ sava iti devena savitrā
GV03sb_06_u:868: prasūtā ityetatsvargyāya śaktyeti yathaitena karmaṇā svargaṃ lokamiyādevametadāha
GV03sb_06_u:872: mano vai savitā prāṇā devāḥ svaryato dhiyā divamiti
GV03sb_06_u:873: svargaṃ haināṃlokaṃ yato dhiyaitasmai karmaṇe yuyuje bṛhajjyotiḥ kariṣyata ityasau
GV03sb_06_u:874: vā ādityo bṛhajjyotireṣa u eṣo 'gniretamvete saṃskariṣyanto bhavanti savitā
GV03sb_06_u:877: yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiya iti /
GV03sb_06_u:879: viprā viprasyeti prajāpatirvai vipro devā viprā bṛhato vipaścita iti prajāpatirvai
GV03sb_06_u:880: bṛhanvipaścidvi hotrā dadha iti yadvā eṣa cīyate tadeṣa hotrā vidhatte cite
GV03sb_06_u:881: hyetasminhotrā adhividhīyante vayunāvidityeṣa hīdaṃ vayunamavindadeka idityeko
GV03sb_06_u:882: hyeṣa idaṃ sarvaṃ vayunamavindanmahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiriti mahatī
GV03sb_06_u:888: devamanuṣyeṣu kīrtiśloko yajamānasānnena prāṇānetasmai karmaṇe yuṅkte vi śloka
GV03sb_06_u:889: etu pathyevaya syādevametadāha śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrā iti prajāpatirvā
GV03sb_06_u:890: amṛtastasya viśve devāḥ putrā ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuritīme vai lokā divyāni
GV03sb_06_u:895: akurvandevā devasya mahimānamojaseti yajño vai mahimā devā devasya yajñaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:896: vīryamojasetyetadyaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa etaśa iti yadvai kiṃ cāsyāṃ tatpārthivaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:897: tadeṣa sarva vimimīte raśmibhirhyenadabhyavatanoti rajāṃsi devaḥ savitā
GV03sb_06_u:898: mahitvanetīme vai lokā rajāṃsyasāvādityo devaḥ savitā tāneṣa mahimnā vimimīte 6.3.1.[19]
GV03sb_06_u:900: deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam prasuva yajñapatim bhagāyeti /
GV03sb_06_u:902: savitā yajño bhagastametadāha prasuva yajñam prasuva yajñapatim bhagāyeti divyo
GV03sb_06_u:903: gandharvaḥ ketapūḥ ketaṃ naḥ punātvityasau vā ādityo divyo gandharvo 'nnaṃ keto
GV03sb_06_u:904: 'nnapūrannaṃ naḥ punātvityetadvācaspatirvācaṃ naḥ svadatviti vāgvā idaṃ karma
GV03sb_06_u:905: prāṇo vācaspatiḥ prāṇo na idaṃ karma svadatvityetat 6.3.1.[20]
GV03sb_06_u:908: asau vā ādityo devaḥ savitā yadu vā eṣa
GV03sb_06_u:909: yajñiyaṃ karma praṇayati tadanārtaṃ svastyudṛcamaśnute devāvyamiti yo
GV03sb_06_u:910: devānavadityetatsakhividaṃ satrājitaṃ dhanajitaṃ svarjitamiti ya etatsarvaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:912: bṛhadgāyatravartanīti sāmāni svāheti yajūṃṣi saiṣā trayī vidyā prathamaṃ jāyate
GV03sb_06_u:913: yathaivādo 'mutrājāyataivamatha yaḥ so 'gnirasṛjyataiṣa sa yo 'ta ūrdhvamagniścīyate 6.3.1.[21]
GV03sb_06_u:917: mātrā tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati tāni nava bhavanti svāhākāro navamo
GV03sb_06_u:918: nava diśo diśo 'gnirnava prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_06_u:919: tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati tāni daśa bhavantyāhutirdaśamī daśākṣarā
GV03sb_06_u:920: virāḍvirāḍagnirdaśa diśo diśo 'gnirdaśa prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya
GV03sb_06_u:925: paśubhirimamanvicāma sa svāya rūpāyāvirbhaviṣyatīti tam paśubhiranvaicantsa
GV03sb_06_u:926: svāya rūpāyāvirabhavattasmādu haitatpaśuḥ svāya rūpāyāvirbhavati ga 6.3.1.[23]
GV03sb_06_u:928: te 'bruvan / yadyaha sarvairanveṣiṣyāmo yātayāmā anupajīvanurvā gave 'śvo
GV03sb_06_u:929: vāśvāya puruṣo vā puruṣāya īyā bhaviṣyanti yadyu asarvairasarvamanuvetsyāma iti
GV03sb_06_u:930: ta etamekam paśuṃ dvābhyām paśubhyām pratyapaśyanrāsabhaṃ goścāveśca
GV03sb_06_u:931: tadyadetamekam paśuṃ dvābhyām paśubhyām pratyapaśyaṃstasmādeṣa ekaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:935: eṣa ha vā anaddhāpuruṣo yo na devānavati na pitṝnna
GV03sb_06_u:940: pañca sampadā bhavanti pañcacitiko 'gniḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_06_u:946: yoniragneryanmuñco 'gnirime paśavo na vai yonirgarbhaṃ hinastyāhiṃsāyai yonirvai
GV03sb_06_u:951: mukham pariśete sarvato yonirgarbham pariśete yonirūpametatkriyate 6.3.1.[28]
GV03sb_06_u:954: aśvaḥ prathamo 'tha rāsabho 'thāja evaṃ hyete 'nupūrvaṃ yadvai

GV03sb_06_u:2443: tadādityamita ūrdhvam prāñcaṃ dadhāti tasmādasāvāditya ita ūrdhvaḥ prāṅ dhīyate
GV03sb_06_u:2453: sa yaḥ sa yajño 'yameva sa yo 'yamagnirukhāyāmetameva
GV03sb_06_u:2462: viṣṇurhi bhūtvā kramate sapatnaheti sapatnānhātra hanti
GV03sb_06_u:2463: gāyatraṃ canda āroheti gāyatraṃ canda ārohati pṛthivīmanu vikramasveti
GV03sb_06_u:2464: pṛthivīmanu vikramate praharati pādaṃ kramata ūrdhvamagnimudgṛhṇātyūrdhvo hi
GV03sb_06_u:2467: viṣṇoḥ / kramo 'sīti viṣṇurhi bhūtvā kramate 'bhimātihetyabhimātīrhātra hanti
GV03sb_06_u:2468: traiṣṭubhaṃ canda āroheti traiṣṭubhaṃ canda ārohatyantarikṣamanu
GV03sb_06_u:2473: viṣṇurhi bhūtvā kramate 'rātīyato hantetyarātīyato hātra hanti
GV03sb_06_u:2474: jāgataṃ canda āroheti jāgataṃ canda ārohati divamanu vikramasveti divamanu
GV03sb_06_u:2475: vikramate praharati pādaṃ kramata ūrdhvamagnimudgṛhṇātyūrdhvo hi rohati 6.7.2.[16]
GV03sb_06_u:2478: viṣṇurhi bhūtvā kramate śatrūyato hanteti śatruyato hātra
GV03sb_06_u:2479: hantyānuṣṭubhaṃ canda ārohetyānuṣṭubhaṃ canda ārohati diśo 'nu vikramasveti
GV03sb_06_u:2480: sarvā diśo 'nu vīkṣate na praharati pādaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2484: etadvai devā akāmayanta parjanyo rūpaṃ syāmeti ta
GV03sb_06_u:2490: rerihadvīrudhaḥ samañjanniti kṣamā vai parjanyo rerihyamāṇo vīrudhaḥ samanakti
GV03sb_06_u:2491: sadyo jajñāno vi hīmiddho akhyaditi sadyo vā eṣa jajñāna idaṃ sarvaṃ vikhyāpayatyā
GV03sb_06_u:2492: rodasī bhānunā bhātyantaritīme vai dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī te eṣa bhānunābhāti
GV03sb_06_u:2502: etadvā etadimāṃlokānita ūrdhvo rohati sa sa parāṅiva roha
GV03sb_06_u:2503: iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā tadyattāvadeva syātpra hāsmāllokādyajamānaścyavetātha
GV03sb_06_u:2508: etadvā etadimāṃlokānita ūrdhvo jayati sa sa parāṅiva jayo
GV03sb_06_u:2509: yo vai parāṅeva jayatyanye vai tasya jitamanvavasyantyatha ya ubhayathā jayati tasya
GV03sb_06_u:2514: abhi mā nivartasvāgne aṅgiraḥ punarūrjā saha rayyetyetena mā
GV03sb_06_u:2515: sarveṇābhinivartasvetyetaccatuṣkṛtvaḥ pratyavarohati caturhi kṛtva ūrdhvo rohati
GV03sb_06_u:2516: tadyāvatkṛtva ūrdhvo rohati tāvatkṛtvaḥ pratyavarohati tamupāvahṛtyoparinābhi
GV03sb_06_u:2523: vāñcantvityannaṃ vai viśo 'nnaṃ tvā sarvaṃ vāñcatvityetanmā
GV03sb_06_u:2528: tatpramucyate vāruṇya 'rcā svenaiva tadātmanā svayā devatayā
GV03sb_06_u:2529: varuṇapāśātpramucyata uduttamaṃ varuṇa pāśamasmadavādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2530: śrathāyeti yathaiva yajustathā bandhurathā vayamāditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye
GV03sb_06_u:2534: etadvā enamado vikṛtyeta ūrdhvam prāñcam pragṛhṇāti taṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2535: tata iti pragṛhṇāti tadyattāvadevābhaviṣyadatra haivaiṣa vyaraṃsyatātha yadenamiti
GV03sb_06_u:2540: nirjaganvāntamaso jyotiṣāgāditi nirjaganvānvā eṣa rātryai tamaso 'hnā
GV03sb_06_u:2541: jyotiṣaityagnirbhānunā ruśatā svaṅga ityagnirvā eṣa bhānunā ruśatā svaṅga ā jāto
GV03sb_06_u:2542: viśvā sadnānyaprā itīme vai lokā viśvā sadnāni tāneṣa jāta āpūrayati parobāhu
GV03sb_06_u:2548: asau vā ādityo haṃsaḥ śuciṣadvasurantarikṣasaditi vāyurvai
GV03sb_06_u:2549: vasurantarikṣasaddhotā vediṣadityagnirvai hotā vediṣadatithiriti sarveṣāṃ vā eṣa
GV03sb_06_u:2551: narastadyo 'yam manuṣyeṣu prāṇo 'gnistametadāha varasaditi sarveṣu hyeṣa
GV03sb_06_u:2552: vareṣu sanna ṛtasaditi satyasadityetadvyomasaditi sarveṣu hyeṣa vyomasu sanno 'bjā
GV03sb_06_u:2553: gojā ityabjāśca hyeṣa gojāśca 'rtajā iti satyajā ityetadadrijā ityadrijā hyeṣa ṛtamiti
GV03sb_06_u:2554: satyamityetadbṛhaditi nidadhāti bṛhaddhyeṣa tadyadeṣa tadenametatkṛtvā nidadhāti 6.7.3.[12]
GV03sb_06_u:2570: asyā upasthe 'ntaragne rucā tvaṃ śivo bhūtvā mahyamagne atho
GV03sb_06_u:2571: sīda śivastvamiti śivaḥ-śiva iti śamayatyevainametadahiṃsāyai tatho haiṣa
GV03sb_06_u:2575: traya ime lokā atho trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_06_u:2585: sarvamāyuriyāditi vātsapreṇainamabhimṛśettadasmai jātāyāyuṣyaṃ karoti tatho ha sa
GV03sb_06_u:2590: prāṇo vai divaḥ prāṇādu vā eṣa
GV03sb_06_u:2591: prathamamajāyatāsmaddvitīyam pari jātavedā iti yadenamado dvitīyam
GV03sb_06_u:2593: ajasramiti prajāpatirvai nṛmaṇā agnirajasra indhāna enaṃ jarate svādhīriti yo vā
GV03sb_06_u:2597: agnirvāyurāditya etāni hāsya tāni tredhā trayāṇi vidnā
GV03sb_06_u:2598: te dhāma vibhṛtā purutreti yadidam bahudhā vihriyate vidnā te nāma paramaṃ guhā
GV03sb_06_u:2599: yaditi yaviṣṭha iti vā asya tannāma paramaṃ guhā vidnā tamutsaṃ yata
GV03sb_06_u:2600: ājaganthetyāpo vā utso 'dbhyo vā eṣa prathamamājagāma samudre tvā numaṇā
GV03sb_06_u:2601: apsvantariti prajāpatirvai nṛmaṇā apsu tvā prajāpatirityetannṛcakṣā īdhe divo agna
GV03sb_06_u:2602: ūdhanniti prajāpatirvai nṛcakṣā āpo diva ūdhastṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivāṃsamiti
GV03sb_06_u:2603: dyaurvai tṛtīyaṃ rajo 'pāmupasthe mahiṣā avardhanniti prāṇā vai mahiṣā divi tvā
GV03sb_06_u:2609: tāvataivainametadupatiṣṭhata indrāgnī vai sarve devāḥ sarvadevatyo 'gniryāvatya 6.7.4.[6]
GV03sb_06_u:2621: tadyadviṣṇukramavātsapre bhavata etadeva tena sarvaṃ sṛjate 6.7.4.[7]
GV03sb_06_u:2626: yuktaṃ na vimucyate pra taddahyate tathaivaitadyajamāno viṣṇukramaireva svargaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2631: tadānīmeva vimuñcettādṛktaddevānāṃ vai vidhāmanu manuṣyāstasmādu hedamuta
GV03sb_06_u:2636: tadyātyahorātre kṣemyo bhavati tasmādu hedamuta mānuṣo grāmo 'horātre
GV03sb_06_u:2641: madhye ha saṃvatsarasya svargo lokaḥ sa yatkanīyo 'rdhātkrameta na haitaṃ svargaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2649: viṣṇukramā rātrirvātsapramemetadvā idaṃ sarvam prajāpatiḥ prajanayiṣyaṃśca
GV03sb_06_u:2652: tadāhuḥ / yadaharviṣṇukramā rātrirvātsapramathobhe evāhanbhavato na rātryāṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2653: kathamasyāpi rātryāṃ kṛte bhavata ityetadvā ene ado dīkṣamāṇaḥ purastādaparāhṇa
GV03sb_06_u:2655: ubhe samasyatyaharhaitadyatpūrvāhṇa evamu hāsyobhe evāhankṛte bhavata ubhe
GV03sb_06_u:2658: sa yadahaḥ saṃnivapsyantsyāt tadahaḥ prātarudita āditye bhasmaiva
GV03sb_06_u:2659: prathamamudvapati bhasmodupya vācaṃ visṛjate vācaṃ visṛjya samidhamādadhāti
GV03sb_06_u:2667: yadvātsapramantataḥ karoti pratiṣṭhā vai vātsapraṃ yathā
GV03sb_06_u:2673: hi vai devāścaranta etatkarmāpaśyaṃstasmādanasa eva pauroḍāśeṣu yajūṃṣyanaso
GV03sb_06_u:2677: devānkarmaṇaiti daivaṃ hāsya karma katam bhavatyatha yo na
GV03sb_06_u:2681: svayaṃ vā eṣa vanīvāhito viṣṇukramairvā eṣa prayāti
GV03sb_06_u:2682: vātsapreṇāvasyatīti na tathā vidyāddaivaṃ vā asya tatprayāṇaṃ yadviṣṇukramā
GV03sb_06_u:2683: daivamavasānaṃ yadvātsapramathāsyedam mānuṣam prayāṇaṃ yadidam prayāti
GV03sb_06_u:2688: manuṣyāstadyadviṣṇukramavātsapre bhavato yadvavāsya daivaṃ rūpaṃ tadasya tena
GV03sb_06_u:2689: saṃskarotyatha yadvanīvāhyate yadevāsya mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tadasyatena saṃskaroti sa
GV03sb_06_u:2690: ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya evaṃ vidvānvanīvāhyate tasmādu
GV03sb_06_u:2706: udu tvā viśve devā agne bharantu cittibhiriti viśve vā etamagre
GV03sb_06_u:2709: no bhava śivastvaṃ supratīko vibhāvasuriti yathaiva yajustathā bandhustaṃ dakṣiṇata
GV03sb_06_u:2710: udañcamādadhāti tasyo bandhu sthālyāṃ gārhapatyaṃ samupyāparamādadhāti sa yadi
GV03sb_06_u:2715: yāṃ kāṃ ca diśaṃ yāsyantsyātprāṅevāgre prayāyātprācī hi digagneḥ svāmeva
GV03sb_06_u:2729: vāgbhavati tadyadagnāvāhite 'kṣa utsarjatyagnereva sā vāgbhavatyagnimeva taddevā
GV03sb_06_u:2735: prāgana upasthāpyottarata uddhatyāvokṣati yatrainamupāvaharati taṃ dakṣiṇata
GV03sb_06_u:2744: prajāpatirvai bharataḥ sa hīdaṃ sarvam bibharti
GV03sb_06_u:2745: vi yatsūryo na rocate bṛhadbhā iti vi yatsūrya iva rocate bṛhadbhā ityetadabhi yaḥ
GV03sb_06_u:2746: pūrum pṛtanāsu tasthāviti pūrurha nāmāsurarakṣasamāsa tamagniḥ
GV03sb_06_u:2747: pṛtanāsvabhitaṣṭhau dīdāya daivyo atithiḥ śivo na iti dīpyamāno daivo 'tithiḥ śivo na
GV03sb_06_u:2759: anapahatapāpmāno bhaviṣyāmo yadyu parāvapsyāmo yadatrāgneyam bahirdhā
GV03sb_06_u:2760: tadagneḥ kariṣyāma upa tajjānīta yathedaṃ karavāmeti te 'bruvaṃścetayadhvamiti
GV03sb_06_u:2765: pratiṣṭhā tadyatrāsya sarvasya pratiṣṭhā tadenatpratiṣṭhāpya yadatrāgneyaṃ
GV03sb_06_u:2769: āpo devīḥ / pratigṛbhṇīta bhasmaitatsyone kṛṇudhvaṃ surabhā u loka iti jagdhaṃ vā
GV03sb_06_u:2770: etadyātayāma bhavati tadetadāha srabhiṣṭha enalloke kurudhvamiti tasmai
GV03sb_06_u:2771: namantāṃ janaya ityāpo vai janayo 'dbhyo hīdaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate supatnīrityagninā vā
GV03sb_06_u:2772: āpaḥ supatnyo māteva putram bibhṛtāpsvenadini yathā mātā putramapasthe
GV03sb_06_u:2777: ityoṣadhīrhyeṣo 'nurudhyate garbho sanjāyase punariti garbho hyeṣa sanjāyate
GV03sb_06_u:2778: punargarbho asyoṣadhīnāṃ garbho vanaspatīnām garbho viśvasya bhūtasyāgne
GV03sb_06_u:2779: garbho apāmasīti tadenamasya sarvasya garbhaṃ karoti 6.8.2.[5]
GV03sb_06_u:2789: iti prasanno hyeṣa bhasmanā yonimapaśca pṛthivīṃ ca bhavati saṃsṛjya
GV03sb_06_u:2790: mātṛbhiṣṭvaṃ jyotiṣmānpunarāsada iti saṃgatya mātṛbhiṣṭvaṃ jyotiṣmānpunarāsada
GV03sb_06_u:2791: ityetatpunarāsadya sadanam punarūrjā saha rayyetyetena māsarveṇābhinivartasvetyetat 6.8.2.[7]
GV03sb_06_u:2806: yaviṣṭhetyetanmaṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāva iti bhūyiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya
GV03sb_06_u:2807: svadhāva ityetatpīyati tvo anu tvo gṛṇātīti pīyatyeko 'nveko gṛṇāti vandāruṣṭe
GV03sb_06_u:2808: tanvaṃ vande agna iti vanditā te 'haṃ tanvaṃ vande 'gna ityetatsa bodhi sūrirmaghavā
GV03sb_06_u:2810: yuyādevametadāha dvābhyāmupatiṣṭhate gāyatryā ca triṣṭubhā ca tasyokto bandhuḥ 6.8.2.[10]
GV03sb_06_u:2813: nava diśo diśo 'gnirnava prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya
GV03sb_06_u:2817: sarvebhyo vā eṣa etaṃ kāmebhya ādhatte tadyadevāsyātra
GV03sb_06_u:2819: saṃdadhātyubhe prāyaścittī karoti ye evāgnāvanugate tasyokto bandhuḥ 6.8.2.[12]
GV03sb_06_u:2822: daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍagnirdeśa diśo diśo 'gnirdaśa prāṇāḥ prāṇā
